Work: L'Allegro, il Penseroso ed il Moderato, HWV 55: Part III, no. 46. Duet "As steals the morn upon the night" (Il Moderato)
Artists: Georg Friedrich Händel  Mary Bevan, Allan Clayton, James Eastaway, Philip Turbett, Orchestra of Classical Opera, Ian Page  Ian Bostridge, Kate Royal, Orchestra of the Age of Enlightenment, Harry Bicket  Eleanor Dennis, Greg Tassell, London Early Opera, Bridget Cunningham  Lucy Crowe, Mark Padmore, The English Concert, Andrew Manze  Susan Gritton, The King’s Consort, Robert King  John Nelson, Ensemble Orchestral de Paris
